query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bid_adjustment_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  campaign_id INT,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(500),
  performance_group_id INT,
  performance_group_name VARCHAR(255),
  keyword_id INT,
  keyword_text VARCHAR(500),
  match_type VARCHAR(32),
  previous_bid DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  new_bid DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  bid_change_percent DECIMAL(10, 2),
  adjustment_type ENUM('manual', 'auto_optimal', 'auto_dayparting', 'auto_placement', 'batch_campaign', 'batch_group') DEFAULT 'manual',
  adjustment_reason TEXT,
  expected_profit_increase DECIMAL(10, 2),
  optimization_score INT,
  applied_by VARCHAR(255),
  applied_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  status ENUM('applied', 'pending', 'failed', 'rolled_back') DEFAULT 'applied',
  error_message TEXT,
  INDEX idx_account_id (account_id),
  INDEX idx_campaign_id (campaign_id),
  INDEX idx_performance_group_id (performance_group_id),
  INDEX idx_applied_at (applied_at),
  INDEX idx_adjustment_type (adjustment_type)
);

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bid_adjustment_history (

  campaign_id INT,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(500),

  bid_change_percent DECIMAL(10, 2),
  adjustment_type ENUM('manual', 'auto_optimal', 'auto_dayparting', 'auto_placement', 'batch_campaign', 'batch_group') DEFAULT 'manual',
  adjustment_reason TEXT,
  expected_profit_increase DECIMAL(10, 2),
  optimization_score INT,
  applied_by VARCHAR(255),
  applied_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  status ENUM('applied', 'pending', 'failed', 'rolled_back') DEFAULT 'applied',
  error_message TEXT,
  INDEX idx_account_id (account_id),
  INDEX idx_campaign_id (campaign_id),
  INDEX idx_performance_group_id (performance_group_id),
  INDEX idx_applied_at (applied_at),
  INDEX idx_adjustment_type (adjustment_type)
);
